name: ACM at UCSD
description:
· Lead an Agile team of 4 to maintain the website backend for ACM at UCSD, interacted by around 3.7k users.
· Created 2 SQL database migrations and wrote 5 API routes with 3 layers of abstractions - Controller, Service, and Repository - to attach images on merch items and allow recruiters to fetch over 200 member resumes.
· Restructured merchandise database to enable up to 5 product images to be displayed for each merch item.
· Tested each feature with jest.js unit tests and Postman API integration tests with WSL2 docker for consistency.

name: UCSD CSE Department
position: Computer Science and Engineering Instructional Assistant
description:
· Host lab sessions 6 hrs/wk to assist students from system programming to advanced data structure.
· Test midterm and final exams to ensure the topic coverage as well as readability and accessibility.
· Provide constructive feedback to students’ programming assignments based on C, C++, and ARM Assembly.

name: Newport Robotics Group
description:
· Organized a team of 3 students to develop a cross-platform mobile application that helps evaluate robots.
· Responsible for multi-platform data collection and analysis, which placed our team second in the world championships out of thousands of competing teams. Automated handling of 10,000+ data points.zed
· Created over 7 different app pages to select FRC Team, record performance, import and export data, etc...
· Published the application in App Store and Google Play with more than 50 total downloads.
